name: Smartise
overview:
Smartise was founded in 2010 as a meeting and organizing place for companies looking for freelance workers.Our mission is to provide a multi-language meeting place to facilitate quick, safe, and efficient online project execution.

On Smartise customers can post their needs in order to receive proposals from suppliers. Freelancers can bid on employer projects. Everyone benefits from the Smartise feedback and communication systems.

Custom workrooms are created for each project so that employers and providers can efficiently plan, establish deliverable and milestones, and execute their projects. Forums further facilitate communication between parties. Parties can even contact each other directly. Smartise provides an unparalleled multi-language platform that best facilitates communication between employers and providers speaking different languages.
